markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ghostbane Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=978)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 160 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 40 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You successfully Strike an [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creature with the weapon to which the fulu is affixed, but you haven't rolled damage.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This white paper fulu bears red ink and attunes a weapon to the spiritual essence of an incorporeal creature. Upon activation, the weapon gains the benefit of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune against the triggering incorporeal creature for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ghostbane Fulu
